c74object.name: th.mcIndexmap~
c74object.description:
Reorder channels of mc
Change the order of channels based on a list of values, similar to zl.indexmap. Input a multichannel on the left inlet, input a list on the right inlet re-ordering the channel order.

objarg.name: channels
objarg.digest: Specify the amount of channels for the output.
objarg.description: Specify the amount of channels for the output.

objarg.name: indexes
objarg.digest: Specify a list of indexes to map the channels to.
objarg.description: Specify a list of indexes to map the channels to.

method.name: signal
method.description: Multi-channel signal input to write to matrix

method.name: list
method.description:
Inlet 1 (hot):
Specify a list of indices to map the channels to.

attribute.name: ramp
attribute.description: Crossfade time in ms for fading between new index maps (default = 0).
